quotes: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment.
author: Jane Austen

quotes: I am free of all prejudice. I hate everyone equally.
author: W.C. Fields

quotes: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
author: J.K. Rowling

quotes: Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory.
author: J.K. Rowling

quotes: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
author: Dr. Seuss
